title: Consider Accessibility
text: Colors should be chosen to ensure that everyone, including those with color blindness, can distinguish them.

title: Avoid Overuse of Colors
text: Using too many colors can make the presentation look cluttered and confusing.

title: Consistency is Key
text: Maintaining a consistent color scheme throughout the presentation helps in creating a professional look.

title: Consider the Background
text: Ensure that the text color contrasts well with the background color for readability.

hintAnswer: Ensure colors are distinguishable and accessible
title: Choose the Best Option
text: The most accessible presentation is one that emphasizes distinguishable and accessible colors.
choices: Use as many colors as possible
Ensure colors are distinguishable and accessible
Choose colors based on personal preference
